title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention â€“ Extend DLP controls to Firefox browser
description:
,With this update, you will be able to extend the Microsoft Purview DLP controls to Firefox browsers. DLP admins will be able to set policies to prevent exfiltration of sensitive information through the Firefox browser by preventing actions such as copying data from a sensitive document to another document using the Clipboard, printing a sensitive document, copying to USB removeable media, or copying to a network share.
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: February CY2023
